title: Savage Sins
description:
He’s Forbidden—a devil I shouldn’t want
Malik Jafar.The one man I can never have.The one man I shouldn’t want.He gets everything he desires.But that doesn’t include me.So why do I keep finding myself alone with him?It would be so simple to give in to him, except for one thing.He’s married to my best friend.Too bad my heart doesn’t care.
She’s Temptation—a sin that could ruin me
Ellie, my little mouse.The one woman I can never have.The one woman who could ruin me.My world is a dangerous one.One where she’s hurt just to get to me.So I change the game and make her mine.Too bad I wasn’t prepared for the consequences.Because sometimes the hit you aren’t expecting comes from within your own ranks.
author: Sarah  Bale
